portfolio.title: Blogs
portfolio.description: A complete full-stack project built using React.js and Django Rest Framework, featuring user authentication and dynamic blog management.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce API

testimonial.description: This course covered a wide range of Python topics, from basics to advanced concepts, with hands-on projects that helped solidify my understanding of the language.
testimonial.author_name: Udemy Certificate in Python Beginner Course

testimonial.description: During my internship at an IT-based company, I gained valuable experience and contributed to several projects, giving my best effort in every task.
This course provided foundational knowledge in areas like MS Office and C programming, giving me a strong start in computer applications.
